```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(plotly)
data(diamonds, package = "ggplot2")
```

Interacve Data Visualization
=======================================

column {data-width=650}
---------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
plot_ly(diamonds, x = ~cut, color = ~clarity, colors = "Accent")
```
column {data-width=350}
---------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
plot_ly(diamonds, x = ~cut, y = ~clarity)
```


### Chart C

```{r}
plot_ly(diamonds, x = ~cut, color = I("red"), stroke = I("black"), span = I(2))
```



Summary {data-orientation=columns}
===============================================

Column
-----------------------------------------------

### Max of Diamond Price

```{r}
valueBox(max(diamonds$price),
         icon = "fa-user")
```

### Average Price of Diamonds

```{r}
valueBox(round(mean(diamonds$price),
         digits = 2),
         icon = "fa-area-chart")
```


### Variance of Diamnod Price

```{r}
valueBox(round(var(diamonds$price),
         digits = 2),
         icon = "fa-area-chart")
```
